channel.title: Articles • Hrvoje Šimić
channel.description: A collection of long form articles by Hrvoje Šimić

item.title: Word Rafting
item.description: I had a crazy idea in the morning two months ago. I was drinking a lot the night before, and that usually causes waking up earlier and with some unusual ideas. I've decided to start an online writing group.

item.title: Goodbye Apple Watch
item.description: After over a year of everyday use, I've recently stopped using the Apple Watch.

item.title: Writing Regularly
item.description: I've stopped writing regularly. I've published a couple of articles about personal knowledge management and stopped. I've broken the habit. I'm trying to get back to it now, but at the time I felt that there is nothing else to say about the topic.

item.title: Lessons from my third failed startup
item.description: I've recently quit the US company that I've co-founded.

item.title: The beauty of journaling
item.description: Journaling is one of my favorite habits, and I love it. I do it almost every day. If you're not sure about the value it provides and are thinking about quitting it, this article is for you.

item.title: Why I love Jekyll and Github Pages
item.description: This website is powered by Jekyll and hosted on Github Pages. I’ve been using this setup since 2011 and I’m really happy with it, and there are multiple reasons for that.

item.title: The power of writing
item.description: The 1% rule says that within an Internet community, such as a wiki, 90% of participants only consume content, 9% edit or modify content and only 1% of participants create content.

item.title: Do whatever you can't stop thinking about
item.description: Since the start of the year, I’ve been making mistakes with with my free time. I’ve been spending some of my leisure time on wrong activities.

item.title: How I apply Zettelkasten to Roam
item.description: In the previous article, I've claimed that the biggest danger of Roam is not being systematic with your note taking, which can lead to having notes that are not valuable.
